body: The air responds to your innate elemental nature, protecting you from harm and cushioning your falls.
name: Airy Step
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Sylphs/New Racial Rules/Sylph Feats/Airy Step

sections.body: You gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against effects with the air or electricity descriptors and effects that deal electricity damage. You may ignore the first 30 feet of any fall when determining falling damage.
sections.name: Benefit
